text: Michael Thomas Blagrove (1934-2016), was a male athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== He represented England in the 1 mile race at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2016 deaths Category:English male middle- distance runners Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games
title: Michael Blagrove
